name: Micro Mystery Monster ACEO
description: One dozen original micro mystery monsters are here! Each one is 2.5"x3.5" (trading card size) made with colored pencil on illustration board. The colored monsters come in an archival clear acrylic frame like a high-end baseball card. Each full color monster comes with an original blue sketch of a different monster, so you get two unique original drawings together at one time. The blue sketches have been randomly matched with the colored monsters, then packaged up and sealed. No one knows which monsters are in which pack. (Pairings may vary from what is seen in the photos.) You will receive a randomly pulled package, making them mystery monsters! Included are two drawings (one colored and framed and one blue sketch on bristol), two monster pin back buttons, and a bookmark! Which ones will you get?

name: Anchored Heart Shirt
description:
Only 100 of these shirts are made, so each size is very limited.

The shirts are light heather grey, ring-spun, super soft cotton polyester blend and are preshrunk. Sizes run true.

name: Blow Your Boat
description:
Title: Blow Your Boat (2011) 
Artist: Bryan Collins 
Size: 5"x7"x1.5"
Medium: Colored pencil on wood

A sailor is at the mercy of the sea, but this old salt is taking charge of his boat's destiny.

Included on the back is one of the colored pencils used to create this original work. The piece is ready to hang with a wire mounted on the back. The surface of the work has been treated with multiple coats of varnish to protect the work and give the finished piece a semi-gloss appearance. A signed certificate of authenticity comes with the work. Please use the contact form if you have any questions.

name: Every Day's A Good Day When You Paint
description:
Title: Every Day's A Good Day When You Paint (2012) 
Artist: Bryan Collins 
Size: 12"x24"
Medium: Acrylic on wood

A tribute to Bob Ross, portrayed by the youth who admire the legacy he has left behind in his work and teachings.

This is not a print. You will receive the original work seen in the photo. It is ready to hang or can be mounted in an open back 12"x24" frame. A signed certificate of authenticity comes with this and all of my original works. Please use the contact form if you have any questions.

name: FrankenToyer
description:
Title: FrankenToyer (2012) 
Artist: Bryan Collins 
Size: 8" Qee
Medium: Acrylic on vinyl

It's FrankenToyer! This is the first Toyer platform I've worked on and I knew immediately I wanted a lumberjack Frankenstein theme. The vinyl figure has been painted with acrylics and ships from Bean Pot Toys. Please message me with any questions.
